name: broccoli-es6-browserify-jest
description: Template for a broccoli driven, es6 supporting, browserify bundling build. Runs tests with jest.

scripts.postinstall: cd node_modules/mout && npm install && node build cjs .; exit 0
scripts.test: rm -r out; BROCCOLI_ENV=development broccoli build out && jest

author: Chris Grieger
